price: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Lalle ne nĩ, ƙashi na daga gare ni ya yi rauni, kuma kaina ya kunnu da furfura, kuma ban kasance marashin arziki ba game da kiranKa, yã Ubangiji!"
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي وَهَنَ ٱلۡعَظۡمُ مِنِّي وَٱشۡتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأۡسُ شَيۡبٗا وَلَمۡ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī wahana al-ʿaẓmu minnī wa-ish'taʿala al-rasu shayban walam akun biduʿāika rabbi shaqiyyan
